statements: DELETE FROM SupplierInventory WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC';
DELETE FROM SupplierInventory WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND product_id = 10;
DELETE FROM SupplierInventory WHERE product_name = 'Sample Product' AND current_inventory < reorder_threshold;

DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM reorder_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
